TextEng: "You disgust me! You must die for your crimes!"
Text: "역겨워! 네 죄에 대한 대가로 죽어야 해!"

TextEng: "Too rich for me. He can have her."
<StartAction>Intimidate</Start> "3000 - and you'd be smart not to outbid me again!"
Text: <StartAction>위협한다.</Start> "금화 3000이야 - 다시는 나보다 높게 부르지 않는 게 현명할 거야!"

TextEng: "I don't have that much gold on me."
"I changed my mind. I don't want her."
<StartAction>Bluff</Start> "The thrall is obviously simple-minded. I'll only offer 1300."
Text: <StartAction>허세를 부립니다.</Start> "그 노예는 명백히 정신이 모자라. 금화 1300만 주겠어."

TextEng: <StartAction>Persuade</Start> "1500 is too high for a sickly human female. I'll go 1300."
Text: <StartAction>설득합니다.</Start> "금화 1500은 병약한 인간 여자치곤 너무 높아. 금화 1300이면 돼."

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
"Thralls serve a master! I'm no thrall!"
"Are you saying you're too good to answer my questions?"
Text: "내 질문에 답하기엔 네가 너무 대단하다는 거야?"
